short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your daily X interactions and manage time with built-in timers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track your daily X (Twitter) activity with a simple tracker and built-in timer.

     Features:
     • Daily counters for Posts, Replies, and Likes
     • Built-in timer with customizable duration (1-180 minutes)
     • Sound notifications when timer completes
     • Stats reset to 0 daily for fresh tracking
     • Clean interface that matches X's design
